title: Royally Yours: A Modern-Day Valentine's Fairytale
description: later published as: Christmas Ever AfterAmerican tomboy Sara Taylor never dreamed of marrying a prince – but that’s exactly what she’s about to do, when handsome Prince Henry proposes after a whirlwind courtship.On the eve of the United Kingdom’s most celebrated wedding ever, the reality that her life will never be the same again sinks in.As Sara hits the streets of London for what might be a final night of freedom, she must decide if her love affair really will have a fairytale ending, or if happy ever after means turning her back on the wedding of the century – and the only man she’s ever truly loved.ROYALLY YOURS is a short story of 11,000 words.
author: Jude Ryan
